phrases: Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony.
Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.
Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them.
But when the world needed him most, he vanished.
A hundred years passed, and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar...
And although his airbending skills are great.
He has a lot to learn before he is ready to save anyone.
But I believe Aang can save the world.
So travelers, the next time you think you hear a strange large bird talking,...
A member of a secret group of air walkers who laugh at gravity...
Are not airbender stories the best?
Is that how it was back then?
I laugh at gravity all the time. !
Tell it to the cap, boy!
It means a lot to hear airbender stories.
It must have been hundred years ago your great grandpa met them.
What are you prattling about child?
Great grand-pappy saw the air walkers last week!
Hey, we are almost at the Northern Air Temple!
This is where they had the championships for sky bison polo.
Do you think we will really find airbenders?
You want me to be like you, or totally honest?
Are you saying I am a liar?
I am saying you are an optimist.
What do you mean they are not?
You can tell by the way they move.
We better find some solid ground before it finds us!
Show that bald kid how it is done!
But I can do more than fancy gliding!
I do not think I can do that!
But here is a good one...
I, I, I have heard stories about you.
If you think this is good, wait until you see the other stuff my Dad designed.
Yeh, my Dad is the mastermind behind this whole place!
It even pumps hot air currents outside to give us a lift when we are gliding.
Yeh, it is great is not it?
Aang used to come here a long time ago.
I think he is a little shocked it is so... different.
This is supposed to be the history of my people.
I am sure some parts of the temple are still the same.
It is nice to see even one part of the temple that is not ruined.
Do not you know enough to stay away from construction sites?
We have to make room for the bathhouse!
Do you know what you did?
Well, people around here are starting to stink.
You cannot treat it this way.
I have seen it when the monks were here.
I know what it is supposed to be like.
He used to come here a hundred years ago.
Who said you could be here?
A long time ago, but not a hundred years,...
My infant son, Teo, was badly hurt and lost his mother.
I needed somewhere to rebuild and I stumbled across this place.
Then I came across these fan like contraptions!
Build a new life for my son, in the air!
Then everyone would be on equal ground, so to speak!
We are just in the process of improving upon what is already here and after all,...
Unfortunately, progress has a way of getting away from us.
Come the pulley system must be oiled before dark.
Wait, how can you tell the time from that thing?
The notches all look the same.
You put spark powder in the candle!
Four flashes, so it is exactly four hours past midday, or, as I call it, four o'candle!
If you like that, wait till you see my finger safe knife sharpener!
Only took me three tries to get it right!
Hey Aang, I want to show you something.
I just cannot get over it.
There is not a single thing that is the same.
I do not know about that.
The Temple might be different, but the creatures that live here...
They are kind of keepers of the temples origins.
Besides, there is one part of the temple that has not changed at all.
It is just like the one in the other Air Temple.
Only an airbender can open it... so inside it is completely untouched,...
I am sorry, this is the last part of temple that the same as it was.
I want it to stay that way.
I just wanted you to know it was here.
Why would you want to use fireflies for light?
Fireflies are a non-flammable light source.
Cover your nose and hold your breath.
Okay, so you brought me all the way down here to see an empty room.
It is filled to the brim with natural gas.
Came across it my first time here.
Unfortunately, I was carrying a torch at the time.
Nearly blew myself and the whole place even more sky high.
Thought my eyebrows would never grow back!
Anyway, there is a vital problem that needs solving.
From time to time we have gas leaks and they are nearly impossible to find.
So this place is an explosion waiting to happen?
Yes, until I figure out how to locate something I cannot see, hear, smell or touch.
I think I was born without that something.
That is the something you are talking about.
I cannot believe I am flying!
Just make sure to keep your mouth closed so you do not swallow a bug!
Teo was right about the air!
All I had to do was trust it.
Even though Teo's not an airbender, he really does have the spirit of one.
If you want to see what is in that room,...
How do I land this thing?
I said do not touch anything!
Oh, do not worry, that experiments old and that egg was just part of last week's lunch.
I cannot believe I am finally going to see what is inside.
How could something that is so small you cannot even see it make such a big stink!
That is the solution to our problem!
If we put a whole mess of rotten eggs in the cellar where the gas seeps up...
The gas will mix with the smell of rotten eggs...
Then, if there is a leak...
Then you just follow your nose to the place where the smell is coming from...
And plug up the hole where the gas is escaping!
Something is wrong I have got to go.
You are making weapons for the Fire Nation!
You make weapons for the Fire Nation!?
It was about a year after we moved here.
Fire Nation soldiers found our settlement.
You were too young to remember this tale.
They were going to destroy everything, burn it to the ground.
I pleaded with them, I begged them to spare us.
They asked what I had to offer.
You must understand, I did this for you!
You cannot give them more weapons.
If I do not give them what they want they will destroy this place.
How can I be proud of you when your inventions are being used for murder?
I need some time to think.
You know better than to keep me waiting.
If I do not get what I came for the Fire Nation will burn this place to rubble!
Then the destruction of this temple will be on your head.
Aang, what are we going to do?
How can we possibly keep them all away?
We have something they do not.
That' something the Fire Nation cannot do.
We finally got the war balloon working, thanks to Sokka.
See, the problem with the old war balloon was you could get it airborne,...
You could put a hole in the top, but then all the hot air would escape.
So the question became, how do you keep a lid on hot air?
A lid is actually the answer.
If you control the hot air, you control the war balloon.
Okay, we have got four kinds of bombs.
Yes, but where is Sokka with the war balloon?
We will have to start without him.
Take them out of the sky, now!
We have got'them on the run!
I think I know how they work.
I remember my Dad tinkering with the counterbalancing system.
Can you get me close to one?
Come on, Sokka, where is that war balloon?
Hey, why are not they shooting at us?
They think we are on their side!
Then I guess they will not see this coming.
Wait a second, you smell that?
That is where the gas is escaping!
It is the only bomb we have got!
I am really glad you guys all live here now.
It is like the hermit crab, maybe you were not born here,...
And now you protect each other.
That means a lot coming from you.
Aang, you were right about air power.
As long as we have got the skies we will have the Fire Nation on the run!
This defeat is the gateway to many victories.
